name: RAS - Resources. Automation. Shooting
description:
I missed the submission for the Metafab 2D Shootout game jam by a couple of seconds (02:59 am.)... 

I didn't get to do everything I wanted to anyway, but it is a "working" game with metafab integration for player accounts, inventory, and a shop.

2D Shooter where all items are Bullets! Balance between Profit, Defense, and Automation! Tutorial-

Unfortunately I didn't get to finish the in game tutorial (among lots of other things..)

Load ammo with Right Click

You need to destroy the detached rocket piece for salvage.

Put the resources in your ship and you can craft a fabricator. Then take some resources and put them in your fabricator.

Now you should make a miner first so you can start getting resources.

But resources need to be refined with a refiner before they can be used.

Then you can point your refiner to your fabricator (or the ship) and you have a basic resource scheme.

But beware, machines require power. You should mine some silicon and make a solar panel (or a bunch). If you run out of power you can always turn off non-essential machines.

Let's not forget about the infected. They will be coming. You probably should have prepared by now.

Note:

This game is partly unfinished. I spent days and days running on barely any sleep since I could only really work on this at night (babies kill jams..)

  • You can only sell polymer at the moment in the Trade Terminal.
  • You cannot buy a robot or a cat (SORRY)
  • Your ship is NOT SAFE (infected can kill you through it)
  • All items were supposed to have bullet effects (Slowing, Knockback, Stun, Bombs, Homing..)
  • Day night cycle was not completed because I couldn't get the lighting system to work properly
  • Enemies were supposed to be a lot smarter.. right now they just always chase you
  • Your ship and machines are supposed to have health that enemies destroy
  • Your metafab inventory is supposed to cross over all saves
  • Batteries don't work
  • I thought basic multiplayer would have been cool..
  • The ship clock does not work. As well as the ship lights, HQ reporting system (tutorial), and enemy scan.
